title: Mike Sheppard (rugby union)
text:
Mike Sheppard (born December 20, 1988) is a <a href="Canadian">Canadian</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He currently plays <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">Lock</a> and can also play <a href="Flanker%20%28rugby%20union%29">Flanker</a> for the <a href="Toronto%20Arrows">Toronto Arrows</a> in <a href="Major%20League%20Rugby">Major League Rugby</a> (MLR).
Professional career.
On November 11, 2018, he made his international debut for as a substitute against and scored a try in the 69th minute.
Sheppard played for the <a href="Ontario%20Blues">Ontario Blues</a>. He previously played <a href="Ontario%20University%20Athletics">Ontario University Athletics</a> rugby for <a href="McMaster%20University">McMaster University</a> and played club rugby for Stoney Creek Camels RFC.
After captaining the <a href="Toronto%20Arrows">Toronto Arrows</a> during their exhibition season in 2018 he has signed on again with the club to play in their first season of <a href="Major%20League%20Rugby">Major League Rugby</a> in 2019.
